content:
Additionally, I want you to include the following target keywords
You are to consider all information i provided in this conversation. Please create a detailed long-form content outline on the topic: HIA Small Works Contract. Location: NSW. 
The whole outline should use numbered paragraphs. The numbering for Headings is 1, 2, 3 etc. For subheadings 1.1, 1.2, 1.3 etc. I intend to refer you to the numbered paragraphs later on. 
You are to provide an estimate word count for each headings. Overall target word count is 750 to 900 words. 
You are to provide a short and attention-grabbing title for the article with only 50 to 70 character count. 
The outline must contain the following topics: What is a HIA Small Works Contract?, When Should HIA Small Works Contracts Be Used?, Importance of HIA Small Works Contract for homeowners, Key Features of HIA Small Works Contract, Advantages of using HIA Small Works Contract, and What is considered a small work?.
As an expert legal writer, you are to re-structure the topics the way the target persona will easily understand and lead them to conversion. 
Strictly Include a call to action at the end of how an expert construction lawyer can help.
Your outline must be 100% human writing style and fix grammar errors like Grammarly.com. 
When possible I want you to include these exact phrase match target keywords and concepts in the outline: {HIA small works contract, HIA contracts, HIA building contract, HIA small works contract nsw, small works contract nsw, HIA small works contract clauses and conditions, HIA small works commercial contract, Cost-plus contract, Joint contracts tribunal, Lump sum contract, Fixed-price contract} 
Please don't write the article yet, only the outline for legal writers. Generate the output in markdown format. 
Do not remind me what I asked you for. Do not apologize. Do not self-reference.

Please write in English language.
